title: Here are the countries that make up most of the $91.5B global gaming business (Spoiler: China rules)
text: Planet Earth spends a ton of money on video games, but it turns out that only a fraction of the countries make up the bulk of that spending. The top 20 nations alone will spend $83 billion on video games by the end of 2015, according to intelligence firm Newzoo. That represents nearly 91 percent of the […] »
